1. Ancient Existence - Cyclone (4:06)
2. Ancient Existence - With Every Human Sin (3:55)
3. Ancient Existence - My Warpath (4:45)
4. Ancient Existence - The Sun Falls Asleep Forever (3:30)
5. Ancient Existence - Death From Inside (3:14)
6. Ancient Existence - Hymn For The Doomed (3:24)
7. Ancient Existence - The Soul To Prey (3:49)

9. Ancient Existence - Slowly Beaten To Death (2:54)
10. Ancient Existence - Life Fluid Addiction (3:38)

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Ancient Existence is right to the core with a dense riffing atmosphere & a superb use of guttural yet understandable vocals. Eyewitness of the Apocalypse and The Killing Continues showcase an amazingly mixture of slow and heavy death metal with genius underlying melodies. On top of this barbaric, guttural vocals provide catchy and sing-a-long friendly verses...

Review by: Northern Metal
